response.overview: Take a trip back in time and prepare to have your brain re-wired and your mental synapses re-arranged by these leading exponents of the acid rock school. Here are the legendary Nektar, Gong and Hawkwind and others captured live on stage performing a mind bending selection of top class acid rock. Tracklist: Curved Air - 'It Happened Today', Family - 'Drowned In Line', Amon Duul II - 'Between The Eyes', Caravan - 'Magic Man', Lucifer's Friend - 'Ride The Sky', UFO - 'Boogie', Soft Machine - 'Tale Of Taliesin', Hawkwind - 'Lives Of Great Men', Gong - 'Flying Teacup', Jack Bruce - 'White Room' and Nektar - 'Desolation Alley'
response.tagline: Compilation of videos from the Classic Rock Productions Rock Legends series.
response.title: Acid Rock - Rock Legends
